meanings.sent1: She teetotalled for a year to focus on her health.
meanings.sent2: He teetotalled after realizing the negative effects of alcohol on his body.
meanings.sent3: The party was so wild that she teetotalled just to avoid the chaos.
meanings.sent4: His commitment to teetotalled living was as strong as steel.
meanings.sent5: Teetotalled individuals often inspire others with their discipline.

meanings.definition: To refrain from drinking alcohol entirely.
meanings.sent1: They teetotalled during the month-long challenge.
meanings.sent2: After the bet, he teetotalled to prove he could do it.
meanings.sent3: She teetotalled at the wedding to be the designated driver.
meanings.sent4: His decision to teetotalled surprised his friends.
meanings.sent5: Teetotalled behavior can lead to a clearer mind and better health.
